items.sentence: At first, Tom thought that the person he saw was Mary, but later found out it was John.
There is a second way to define the Gabriel-Roiter measure which may be more intuitive.
Tom backed his car up to check, but the raccoon he had run over was dead as a doornail.
When Tom says he's going to bed early, he means that he's going to bed before midnight.
There's no doubt that Tom's childhood laid down the blueprint for the rest of his life.
